item.title: What do I binge next? A detailed overview of the top 250 TV shows
item.description: Update December 24th 2020: My table made it into the “Honourable Mentions” section. Congrats to the winner Niels van der Velden and all the others that are mentioned! In consequence, I decided to visualize the top 250 TV shows according to IMDb users as a more helpful table then the original one on IMDb as my contribution to the ongoing RStudio table contest: Tables are a fantastic way to communicate lists of quantitative and qualitative information.
